pageContext.claim: “A state that is a model for applying a science-based approach to the decreasing cases and hospitalizations without implementing a punishing lockdown. Arizona's record in reducing the spread of the virus while maintaining hospital capacity and allowing society to continue functioning and functioning very nicely, very successfully is an example that shows how our path forward can work in other states.”
pageContext.analysis: This is a false description. Arizona ordered that bars, restaurants, gyms and theaters be closed on at least two separate occasions.
